meanings.sent1: I found a duad of socks in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: The duad of birds flew together in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The duad of shoes danced around the room.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a duad, always together.
meanings.sent5: The duad of stars shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Two things of the same kind
meanings.sent1: She bought a duad of apples from the market.
meanings.sent2: The duad of flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The duad of kittens played with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: Their voices blended like a duad in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The duad of trees stood tall in the forest.
